Two (2) ‘A’ level/NCE 
passes including 
Chemistry and one 
(1) other Science 
subject.  
  
Five (5) SSC credits 
in Mathematics, 
Chemistry, English  
Language and two  
(2) of Physics,  
Biology and 
AgriculturalScience 
.  
  
Chemistry and two (2) other 
subjects chosen from 
Physics, Biology and 
Mathematics.  
  
DIRECT ENTRY  
(i) OAU, ILORIN, UDU, EKSU, CALABAR, and JOS require 'A’ 
level passes in either Physics or Mathematics. EKSU - 
Mathematics only. CALABAR accepts NCE credit or merit 
in Chemistry and one (1) other subject.  
(ii) EKSU, MINNA, MAUTY, BENIN, DELSU, OAU and UNN, 
accept NCE in Science subjects.  
(iii) RSUST, MINNA and MAUTY accept NCE meritand 
ND/HND lower credit.  
 (vi)  LAGOSaccepts  
(a) very good passes in the following JUPEB subjects: 
Chemistry, Physics, and Biology and 'O’level 
requirementsforDirectEntry.  
(b) NCEcredit/meritinChemistryandanyothersciencesubject.  
(v) EKSU and JOS accept 'O' level credit passes in 
Mathematics and English language.  
(a NCEmerit  
(b Passin General English at NCE as equivalent to 'O' level 
credit pass in English.  
(c JOS does not accept NCE Integrated Science.  
(vi) IMSU accepts NCE merit in Education and the two (2) 
subjects to be combined with education into 300 level
